_header: Look man above thee is joy that ever shall last
Title(s): ‘Lok man beneyth the ys paine with owtyn rest’
_description: Heaven and Hell: ‘Lok man beneyth the ys paine with owtyn rest’ — one couplet

BodAsh750.Transcription:
Lok man above the ys Ioy þat euery schall lasteLok a man be
                    neyth the ys paine with awtyn rest
